import Head from 'next/head' import Link from 'next/link' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import styles from './Details.module.css' function PostDetails({ post }) { const router = useRouter() const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault() router.push('/blog/posts') } const { id, title } = router.query return ( <> Blog Post: {id}
Blog Post {id} Details:
Title: {title}
By:
Body:
) } export default PostDetails
